meanings.definition: A token or memento of a place visited or an event attended.
meanings.sent1: I bought a small souvenir from the zoo to remember my fun day.
meanings.sent2: She keeps a collection of souvenirs from all the countries she has visited.
meanings.sent3: The souvenir from the beach trip made her smile every time she saw it.
meanings.sent4: The old watch was a souvenir of his grandfather's time in the war.
meanings.sent5: The keychain souvenir was a colorful reminder of the amusement park.

meanings.definition: To remember or look back on fondly.
meanings.sent1: He souvenirs the days spent fishing with his dad.
meanings.sent2: She souvenirs the summer vacations spent at the lake house.
meanings.sent3: They souvenir the silly jokes shared during road trips.
meanings.sent4: The smell of fresh bread always souvenirs her of her grandmother's kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The song souvenirs him of his high school prom night.
